# Markdown Features
import BrowserWindow from '@site/src/components/BrowserWindow';

Documentation is one of your product's interfaces with your users. A well-written and well-organized set of docs helps your users understand your product quickly. Our aligned goal here is to help your users find and understand the information they need, as quickly as possible.

translations.zh-CN: 文档是产品与用户交互的重要界面。一套撰写精良、结构清晰的文档能帮助用户快速理解产品。我们的共同目标是让用户以最快速度找到并理解所需信息。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus 2 uses modern tooling to help you compose your interactive documentation with ease. You may embed React components, or build live coding blocks where your users may play with the code on the spot. Start sharing your eureka moments with the code your audience cannot walk away from. It is perhaps the most effective way of attracting potential users.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 2 采用现代化工具链，助您轻松构建交互式文档。您可以嵌入 React 组件，或创建实时编程区块让用户即时体验代码。这是吸引潜在用户最有效的方式——让观众无法移开视线的代码演示。

segments.source_content:
:::info

This section assumes you are using the official Docusaurus content plugins.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

本节内容默认您正在使用官方 Docusaurus 内容插件。

segments.source_content: ## Standard features {#standard-features}
Markdown is a syntax that enables you to write formatted content in a readable syntax.

translations.zh-CN: Markdown 是一种通过可读性语法编写格式化内容的标记语言。

segments.source_content: We use [MDX](https://mdxjs.com/) as the parsing engine, which can do much more than just parsing [standard Markdown syntax](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax), like rendering React components inside your documents as well.

translations.zh-CN: 我们使用 [MDX](https://mdxjs.com/) 作为解析引擎，它不仅能解析 [标准 Markdown 语法](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax)，还能在文档中渲染 React 组件。

segments.source_content:
```md
### My Doc Section

Hello world message with some **bold** text, some _italic_ text, and a [link](/)

![img alt](/img/docusaurus.png)
```

My Doc Section

Hello world message with some **bold** text, some _italic_ text and a [link](/) ![img alt](/img/docusaurus.png)

Markdown is declarative Some may assume a 1-1 correlation between Markdown and HTML, e.g., `![Preview](/img/docusaurus.png)` will always become ``, as-is. However, _that is not the case_. The Markdown syntax `![message](url)` only declaratively tells Docusaurus that an image needs to be inserted here, but we may do other things like transforming a [file path to URL path](./markdown-features-assets.mdx#images), so the generated markup may differ from the output of other Markdown renderers, or a naïve hand-transcription to the equivalent JSX/HTML code. In general, you should only assume the _semantics_ of the markup (` ``` ` fences become [code blocks](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx); `>` becomes [quotes](#quotes), etc.), but not the actual compiled output.
## Front matter {#front-matter}

Front matter is used to add metadata to your Markdown file. All content plugins have their own front matter schema, and use the front matter to enrich the default metadata inferred from the content or other configuration.

translations.zh-CN: Front matter 用于为 Markdown 文件添加元数据。所有内容插件都有各自的 front matter 架构，并利用这些元数据来增强从内容或其他配置推断出的默认元数据。

segments.source_content: Front matter is provided at the very top of the file, enclosed by three dashes `---`. The content is parsed as [YAML](https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/).

translations.zh-CN: Front matter 位于文件最顶部，由三个破折号 `---` 包裹。其内容以 [YAML](https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/) 格式解析。

segments.source_content:
```md
---
title: My Doc Title
more_data:
  - Can be provided
  - as: objects
    or: arrays
---
```
## Quotes {#quotes}
Markdown quotes are beautifully styled:

translations.zh-CN: Markdown 引用区块具有精美样式：

segments.source_content:
```md
> Easy to maintain open source documentation websites.
>
> — Docusaurus
```

<BrowserWindow>

> Easy to maintain open source documentation websites.
>
> — Docusaurus

</BrowserWindow>
## Details {#details}
Markdown can embed HTML elements, and [`details`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/details) HTML elements are beautifully styled:

translations.zh-CN: Markdown 可嵌入 HTML 元素，其中 [`details`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/details) 元素会被优雅地样式化：

segments.source_content:
```md ### Details element example
Toggle me!
This is the detailed content

Nested toggle! Some surprise inside...
😲😲😲😲😲
```

Details element example

Toggle me!
This is the detailed content

Nested toggle! Some surprise inside...
😲😲😲😲😲

:::note

In practice, those are not really HTML elements, but React JSX elements, which we'll cover next!

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

实际上这些并非真正的 HTML 元素，而是 React JSX 元素——我们将在后续章节详述！

:::
